mapper.select: SELECT * FROM attendance a JOIN user u WHERE a.user_id = u.id AND a.club_id = 1 ORDER BY a.date, u.id;
SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT( date,'%Y-%m-%d') date FROM attendance WHERE club_id = 1 ORDER BY date;

SELECT a.*, s.sem_name, u.name FROM attendance a JOIN sem_date s ON a.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.ent_date JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE s.sem_name=#{sem_name} AND a.club_id=1 ORDER BY a.date, a.user_id
